data.title: Texas Roadhouse
data.text: If you're looking for some delicious food, this is definitely the place to go! The steaks and the catfish are excellent. Family friendly atmosphere and they have a good kids menu.The prices are good and you definitely get your monies worth. They also have a full bar available.

data.title: Excellent service
data.text: This place was packed again, as it is almost every time, and most people I ask think it's the best restaurant in Menifee. I agree that the table service is the best. But the food is average at best. My pulled pork had hard chunks of very overcooked meat, served on a lake of fatty oil.

data.title: Good place!
data.text: When this restaurant first opened the prime rib was absolutely awesome.  But about a year into it, the meat didn't seem to be as tender.  Maybe it was just a fluke but not sure.  We haven't been back in a while, hopefully it is beter!

data.title: Cant go wrong even if you dont eat beef
data.text: THE FOOD is excellent...and i dont even eat beef!! I especially love the pork chop and usually i get it with sautéed onions and steak fries. I don't mind saying that it is plenty to eat and usually i dont bring any home.   I have had the ribs before...but either share them or take them home to eat the next day..either way they are excellent! My friends and family love a good steak and they say they are amazing!  Oh and just an fyi  the salads and baked potatoes are good as well!  Staff is always nice..it gets a little loud sometimes...but a fun place to meet up with friends and nothing you order will be disappointing! Peanuts on ever table...shells on the floor! Rolls that melt in your mouth start out the meal and though i have never made it to dessert...i am sure you can find something good!   Enjoy!  Oh i almost forgot..they have an earlybird dinner and lunches on fri/sat and not sure about Sunday...check online!

data.title: Always so yummy!
data.text: We really enjoy the food at Texas Roadhouse in Menifee. The menu is reasonably priced for the quantity and quality of food! The wait staff is always friendly, knowledgable and polite.

data.title: Great food and Service
data.text: Excellent steak, ribs, and drinks. Would eat there every day if possible. Service was excellent. It can very busy, so helps to call ahead.

data.title: Great steaks
data.text: We have only been here twice but service and food were excellent. It can be very crowded almost any day but they do have a call ahead feature to put you on the waiting list before you leave home and it seemed to reduce our wait there compared to just showing up. I highly recommend the NY strip.

data.title: Good steak
data.text:
My wife and I went here on a Saturday night for dinner wow this place is packed so be ready to wait a good half hour or more. But the steak was really good so it's worth the wait. 
BBQ ribs where not as good as expected but my wife's Margarita was great. Oh and the dinner rolls have to to be my favorite

data.title: Friendly Place to Dine
data.text:
Avery good steak & chop house........Love being able to throw peanut shells on the floor.  Full bar, good selection of beers & wine.
Service very prompt, friendly & helpful.

data.title: Family fun Restaurant
data.text: This is the restaurant that lets you throw your peanut shells on the floor. Very good steaks, chicken, Prime Rib. Good bar. Will be back when in area.

data.title: Casual dining
data.text: Kids like the peanut shells on the floor idea. The menu  is standard, the atmosphere is usual franchise feel, nice happy waitresses though which is a plus.

data.title: B-Day Celebration at Texas Roadhouse
data.text: Even with all the new restaurants coming into Menifee/Sun City.. Texas Roadhouse still has the best steaks around. Love the Rib-eyes here.. Always cooked to perfection. Only place around you can get slow cooked ribs that are so tender the meat falls off the bone.  This place is great for a quick dinner or a special occasion like we were celebrating tonight. A bit noisy at peak periods but service is excellent.. expect a wait most nights as this place is really popular. If your celebrating a B-day they will make a big fuss for the person & put e'm on a saddle for a pic.

data.title: GOOD FOOD, BUT LOUD
data.text: Stopped here for a late lunch after visiting the OERM in Perris. Food and Service were good, but it was very loud inside the restaurant and made conversation hard.

data.title: Great food and service and reasonal prices
data.text:
This place is loud, noisy and very busy, but fun. And the food was great. Hubby had ribeye steak that was tender and cooked to perfection.  I had shrimp over rice, it was plentiful and good. We also had the cactus blossom...yummy!  The portions are so large there was more food than we could eat, so we brought some home for lunch the following day. 
Our waitress, Kelly, was terrific.  She was very attentive making sure everything was to our liking.  Thank you, Kelly!!
We were there on a Monday evening and were surprised at how busy they were. When we left at about 8:15pm there was still a line out the door, and they close at 9:00pm on Mondays.  So expect to have to wait to get seated no matter what day you go, but I do recommend you go.  The wait is worth it.

data.title: Food & Service
data.text:
The food is very good and the service is friendly and attentive.The noise level in the 
restaurant leans to the high level which makes conversation a bit cumbersome.

data.title: Can't beat the price!
data.text: My favorite to order is there Ribs....But I haven't had anything I didn't like from there!  Homemade rolls and honey butter can't be beat!  It can get noisy in there depending on when you go but the food is worth it.  We take advantage of there take out, and call ahead seating!

data.title: Not for me
data.text: Had a great experience, fantastic waitress. Lots of people having a lot of fun at this restaurant. Just not my type of food. Lots of heavy, fried food.

data.title: We Love them
data.text: Best place in Menifee.  The comes from the parking lot as we are walking in.  My FAVORITE FAMILY.  How can you not feel loved.  Everyone is so nice and friendly.  She made sure we sat at her table.  And we love her.  Dawn, she is the best waitress.  She takes care of us.  And our meal was wonderful.  Steaks to perfection!

data.title: Always Amazing
data.text: I'm fortunate to live close to this restaurant and have been there several times.  The food is always amazing and most go home with leftovers.  The ribs are to die for the meat just falls off the bone.  My favorite side is the sweet potato, but all are great.  You can make a reservation which another great thing they do, as the line can get quite long on the weekends.  Try it, you won't be disappointed.

data.title: Always Great Food with Great Service!
data.text:
Texas Roadhouse in Menifee has always been good.  The sirloin steaks are always cooked right, and  are flavorful.  The ribs fall off the bone and are totally worth it!  They give you peanuts to start and you can throw the shells on the floor...which normally you wouldn't do at a restaurant, but there is something empowering about tossing shells on the floor!  OK, back to the review!!
The staff are always friendly and helpful...they work really hard...and the manager is friendly as well and really cares that you have a good experience!!
If you've never tried the fried pickles, they're worth trying once and they prepare chicken right too!  The only thing I've found to be not so good was the roadkill!  No, really, that's what it's called.  I'm sure some like it, but it wasn't my favorite!  Also, it gets busy, so make sure you use call ahead seating!!
